tier_cr_1_5.name: Goo Ball
tier_cr_1_5.description: A small, gelatinous blob of pure mana. They are the simplest of magical life forms, often found near mana-rich Ley Lines. They are naturally docile and only attack when threatened.

behavior.social: Solitary, but will merge to form a King Goo when threatened.
behavior.tactics: Bounces around the battlefield and splits when hit. It's a simple, unpredictable foe.
behavior.notes: Vulnerable to most physical damage but can regenerate. They have no strong elemental ties.

abilities.name: Bounce
abilities.effect: Deals 1d4 physical damage.

abilities.name: Split
abilities.effect: The first time the Goo Ball is hit, it splits into two smaller Goo Balls, each with half the current Vitality.

tier_cr_1_5.name: Eyepicker
tier_cr_1_5.description: A scavenger bird with a razor-sharp beak and a piercing caw. They often nest in rocky outcroppings and are known for their unnerving ability to pick out the eyes of their fallen prey.

behavior.tactics: Works with its flock to surround and overwhelm enemies. They rely on their numbers and speed to win.
behavior.notes: Avoids one-on-one fights and flees when its allies are defeated.

abilities.name: Peck
abilities.effect: Deals 1d4 physical damage.

abilities.name: Flock Tactics (Passive)
abilities.effect: Gains a +1 bonus to attack for each other Eyepicker adjacent to its target.

abilities.name: Distracting Caw
abilities.effect: As a bonus action, the Eyepicker can caw loudly at a target, giving the next attack against that target a +1 bonus.

tier_cr_1_5.name: Nut Trooper
tier_cr_1_5.description: A sentient plant that resembles a humanoid with a large, armored seed for a head. They are often found in forests, defending their territory with crude spears and hardened shells.

behavior.tactics: Fights on the front lines, using its shell to resist damage.

abilities.name: Spear Jab
abilities.effect: Deals 1d6 physical damage.

abilities.name: Shell Defense (Reaction)
abilities.effect: As a reaction when attacked, the Nut Trooper can withdraw into its shell, increasing its Damage Reduction to 3 for that single attack.

tier_cr_1_5.name: Bandit
tier_cr_1_5.description: A common thug or cutthroat, often found in the wilds or the back alleys of major cities. They rely on numbers and dirty tricks to get what they want.

behavior.tactics: Tries to get a numerical advantage and use minor debuffs to gain an edge.
behavior.notes: Will flee when outnumbered or severely wounded.

abilities.name: Crude Sword
abilities.effect: Deals 1d8 physical damage.

abilities.name: Pocket Sand
abilities.effect: As a bonus action, the Bandit can throw sand at a target's eyes. The target has a -2 penalty on their next attack roll.

tier_cr_1_5.name: Sporeling
tier_cr_1_5.description: A walking fungus that releases clouds of spores to disorient its enemies. They are a passive creature that only attacks in self-defense.

behavior.tactics: Uses its spores to protect itself and then roots itself to escape.
behavior.notes: Is immune to being moved once it uses its root ability.

abilities.name: Headbutt
abilities.effect: Deals 1d4 physical damage.

abilities.name: Confusing Spores (Reaction)
abilities.effect: When hit by a melee attack, the attacker must make a Spirit DC 12 check or have a -1 penalty to their next roll.

abilities.name: Root
abilities.effect: As a bonus action, the Sporeling can root itself to the ground, becoming immune to being moved until its next turn.

tier_cr_1_5.name: Cinder Pup
tier_cr_1_5.description: A small, fire-infused canine from the slopes of Mount Dragnor. They are playful, but their touch is hot enough to burn flesh.

behavior.tactics: Charges in to inflict fire damage, then retreats to a safe distance.
behavior.notes: They are immune to fire damage and can be found alongside other fire elementals.

abilities.name: Hot-headed (Passive)
abilities.effect: A creature that hits the Cinder Pup with a melee attack takes 1d4 fire damage.

abilities.name: Ember Bite
abilities.effect: Deals 1d6 fire damage.

abilities.name: Smoke Puff
abilities.effect: As a bonus action, creates a 5-foot cube of smoke, lightly obscuring the area for 1 round.

tier_cr_1_5.name: Hobgoblin
tier_cr_1_5.description: A highly organized and disciplined soldier of the goblinoid races. Hobgoblins are fiercely loyal to their commanders and fight with military precision. They are a sign that a major goblinoid force is nearby.

behavior.tactics: Commands its allies from the front lines, focusing on tactical strikes and defensive maneuvers.
behavior.notes: Often found with other goblins, including archers and shamans.

abilities.name: Longsword
abilities.effect: Deals 1d8+4 physical damage.

abilities.name: Commander's Orders
abilities.effect: As a bonus action, the Hobgoblin can grant an allied Goblin a free 5-foot movement.

abilities.name: Shield Bash
abilities.effect: As a bonus action after attacking, can attempt to shove a target 5 feet.

tier_cr_1_5.name: Thorn Creeper
tier_cr_1_5.description: An aggressive, carnivorous plant that uses thorny vines to ensnare its prey. They lie in wait, camouflaging themselves in dense foliage before attacking.

behavior.tactics: Relies on its camouflage to get the drop on enemies. It uses its vines to restrain and damage a single target, letting it bleed out.

abilities.name: Thorn Lash
abilities.effect: Deals 1d10 physical damage.

abilities.name: Ensnare
abilities.effect: On a successful hit, the target must make an Agility DC 13 check or become 'Restrained'.

abilities.name: Camouflage
abilities.effect: If the Thorn Creeper has not moved this turn, attacks against it have a -1 penalty.

tier_cr_1_5.name: Gloomfang Wolf
tier_cr_1_5.description: A vicious, pack-hunting wolf from the shadowed forests. They are known for their venomous fangs and their mournful howls that can chill a hero to the bone.

behavior.tactics: Focuses on poisoning and harassing targets before moving in for the kill.
behavior.notes: Their howl can rally other wolves in the area.

abilities.name: Vicious Bite
abilities.effect: Deals 1d10 physical damage.

abilities.name: Venomous Fangs
abilities.effect: On a successful hit, the target must make a Might DC 12 check or become 'Poisoned' for 1 minute.

abilities.name: Pack Howl
abilities.effect: As a major action, grants all allied wolves within 30 feet a +1 bonus to their next attack roll.

tier_cr_1_5.name: Scalebound Skirmisher
tier_cr_1_5.description: A lizard-like warrior from the Scalebound Clans. They are master hunters and skirmishers, using their speed and agility to get the drop on their enemies.

behavior.tactics: Attacks from a distance, using its high agility to avoid close-range combat.
behavior.notes: Will use its dagger as a last resort when enemies get too close.

abilities.name: Shortbow
abilities.effect: Ranged attack dealing 1d6 physical damage.

abilities.name: Skirmish (Passive)
abilities.effect: After making a ranged attack, the Skirmisher can immediately move up to 10 feet without provoking an Attack of Opportunity.

abilities.name: Quick Stab (Reaction)
abilities.effect: If an enemy moves within 5 feet of the Skirmisher, it can use its reaction to make a single dagger attack (1d4 damage).

tier_cr_1_5.name: Red Goo
tier_cr_1_5.description: A volatile ooze that radiates a faint heat. It's surprisingly aggressive.

abilities.name: Singe
abilities.effect: Deals 1d6 fire damage.

tier_cr_1_5.name: Blue Goo
tier_cr_1_5.description: A frigid ooze that slows its prey before consuming it.

abilities.name: Chill Touch
abilities.effect: Deals 1d4 physical damage and may slow the target.

tier_cr_1_5.name: Mage Goo
tier_cr_1_5.description: A rare ooze shimmering with arcane energy. It has rudimentary magical abilities.

abilities.name: Spark
abilities.effect: Deals 1d8 lightning damage.

tier_cr_1_5.name: Poison Goo
tier_cr_1_5.description: A sickly green ooze that leaks a foul-smelling toxin.

abilities.name: Venom Spit
abilities.effect: Deals 1d4 physical damage and may poison the target.

tier_cr_1_5.name: King Goo
tier_cr_1_5.description: A massive ooze that has absorbed countless smaller kin. It wears a rusty crown from a past victim.

abilities.name: Crushing Leap
abilities.effect: Deals 2d8 physical damage to all in a small area.

abilities.name: Summon Goo
abilities.effect: Summons 1d4 Goo Balls.

tier_cr_1_5.name: Metal Goo
tier_cr_1_5.description: An ooze with a metallic sheen and incredibly tough hide. It is slow but very difficult to damage.

abilities.name: High Defense
abilities.effect: Resistant to physical damage.

tier_cr_1_5.name: Gloomcap
tier_cr_1_5.description: A man-sized mushroom creature that wanders the darkest parts of the woods. When threatened, it releases a cloud of disorienting spores from its cap.

abilities.name: Headbutt
abilities.effect: Deals 1d8 physical damage.

abilities.name: Spore Cloud
abilities.effect: All targets in a 10-ft radius must pass a Spirit DC 11 check or have Disadvantage on their next action.

tier_cr_1_5.name: Barkmite
tier_cr_1_5.description: A large, six-legged insect whose carapace perfectly resembles the bark of ancient trees. It lies in wait for prey, relying on its incredible toughness to weather any initial assault.

abilities.name: Pincer Crush
abilities.effect: Deals 1d10 physical damage.

abilities.name: Iron Shell
abilities.effect: Resistant to physical damage. Vulnerable to fire damage.

tier_cr_1_5.name: Whisperwisp
tier_cr_1_5.description: A faint, glowing orb of mist that drifts silently through the woods. They are drawn to strong emotions and feed on willpower, leaving their victims feeling drained and hopeless.

abilities.name: Draining Touch
abilities.effect: Deals 1d4 Spirit damage (targets Resolve instead of Vitality).

abilities.name: Fade
abilities.effect: Can become invisible for one round as an action.

tier_cr_1_5.name: Goblin Shaman
tier_cr_1_5.description: A goblin that has learned rudimentary magic, often used to aid its allies or hinder its foes.

abilities.name: Hex
abilities.effect: Target receives -1 to their next roll.

abilities.name: Spark
abilities.effect: Deals 1d6 lightning damage.

tier_cr_1_5.name: Ghoul
tier_cr_1_5.description: A swift and ravenous undead that can paralyze its victims with a touch.

abilities.name: Paralyzing Claw
abilities.effect: Deals 1d8 physical damage and may paralyze.

tier_cr_1_5.name: Skeleton Warrior
tier_cr_1_5.description: The animated bones of a long-dead soldier, retaining some of its former martial skill.

abilities.name: Rusty Sword
abilities.effect: Deals 1d8 physical damage.

tier_cr_1_5.name: Wraith
tier_cr_1_5.description: An incorporeal spirit filled with hatred for all life, capable of draining vitality.

abilities.name: Life Drain
abilities.effect: Deals 1d10 necrotic damage and heals the Wraith for half.

abilities.name: Incorporeal
abilities.effect: Resistant to physical damage.

tier_cr_1_5.name: Dire Wolf
tier_cr_1_5.description: A large and ferocious wolf that hunts in packs.

abilities.name: Vicious Bite
abilities.effect: Deals 1d10 physical damage.

tier_cr_1_5.name: Giant Spider
tier_cr_1_5.description: A monstrous arachnid that spins thick webs to trap its prey.

abilities.name: Venomous Bite
abilities.effect: Deals 1d8 physical damage and may poison.

abilities.name: Web
abilities.effect: May ensnare a target, reducing their Agility.

tier_cr_1_5.name: Eye Spy
tier_cr_1_5.description: A floating eyeball with small wings. It observes intruders and calls for powerful allies.

abilities.name: Alarm
abilities.effect: Attempts to summon stronger monsters to the battle.

tier_cr_1_5.name: Beak
tier_cr_1_5.description: A large, aggressive bird with a razor-sharp beak. It attacks with surprising speed.

abilities.name: Drill Peck
abilities.effect: Deals 1d10 physical damage.

tier_cr_1_5.name: Roach
tier_cr_1_5.description: A giant, disgusting cockroach that thrives in filth and darkness. Surprisingly resilient.

abilities.name: Filth Cloud
abilities.effect: May inflict disease or disadvantage on nearby foes.

tier_cr_1_5.name: Gonghead
tier_cr_1_5.description: A bizarre, floating head with a metallic surface. When struck, it emits a deafening, disorienting clang.

abilities.name: Sonic Boom
abilities.effect: Deals 1d8 sonic damage and may stun.

tier_cr_1_5.name: Bandit Thug
tier_cr_1_5.description: A common highway robber looking for an easy score.

abilities.name: Crude Sword
abilities.effect: Deals 1d8 physical damage.

tier_cr_1_5.name: Order Acolyte
tier_cr_1_5.description: A new recruit to the Champions of Order, armed with a mace and zealous faith.

abilities.name: Minor Heal
abilities.effect: Can restore a small amount of vitality to an ally.

tier_cr_1_5.name: Dominion Apprentice
tier_cr_1_5.description: A mage-in-training from the Arcane Dominion, eager to test their unethical spells.

abilities.name: Magic Missile
abilities.effect: Deals 1d10 arcane damage.

tier_cr_1_5.name: Harpy
tier_cr_1_5.description: A creature with the body of a bird and the head of a woman, whose enchanting song lures travelers to their doom.

abilities.name: Luring Song
abilities.effect: May charm or confuse targets who fail a Spirit check.

abilities.name: Sharp Talons
abilities.effect: Deals 1d8 physical damage.

tier_cr_1_5.name: Skeleton Archer
tier_cr_1_5.description: The skeletal remains of a hunter, mindlessly firing arrows at any living thing it sees.

abilities.name: Bone Arrow
abilities.effect: Deals 1d8 physical damage at range.

tier_cr_1_5.name: Cave Bear
tier_cr_1_5.description: A massive bear that has adapted to life in the dark, with a powerful sense of smell and a ferocious temper.

abilities.name: Maul
abilities.effect: Deals 2d8 physical damage.

tier_cr_1_5.name: Razor Boar
tier_cr_1_5.description: A wild boar with tusks as sharp as daggers.

abilities.name: Gore
abilities.effect: Deals 1d10 physical damage.

tier_cr_1_5.name: Giant Wasp
tier_cr_1_5.description: A wasp the size of a dog with a painful, venomous sting.

abilities.name: Venomous Stinger
abilities.effect: Deals 1d6 damage and may poison.

tier_cr_1_5.name: Rock Serpent
tier_cr_1_5.description: A snake with scales as hard as stone, capable of constricting with immense force.

abilities.name: Constrict
abilities.effect: Grapples a target, dealing damage each round.

tier_cr_1_5.name: Corpse Eater
tier_cr_1_5.description: A monstrous form of ghoul that prefers to feast on the already dead, but will attack if its meal is disturbed.

abilities.name: Foul Bite
abilities.effect: Deals 1d8 damage and may inflict disease.

tier_cr_1_5.name: Nut Mage
tier_cr_1_5.description: A wise-looking nut person who can channel the magic of the forest.

abilities.name: Thorn Whip
abilities.effect: Deals 1d8 damage and can pull a target closer.

tier_cr_1_5.name: Nut Archer
tier_cr_1_5.description: A nut person armed with a bow made from a bent twig.

abilities.name: Splinter Arrow
abilities.effect: Deals 1d6 damage at range.

tier_cr_1_5.name: Frostfang Wolf
tier_cr_1_5.description: A wolf native to the Glacial Maw, with a coat of pure white and breath that mists with cold.

abilities.name: Frost Bite
abilities.effect: Deals 1d8 physical damage and 1d4 cold damage.

tier_cr_1_5.name: Stonekin Brawler
tier_cr_1_5.description: A powerful lizard-like warrior from Stonegard who fights with their bare fists.

abilities.name: Pummel
abilities.effect: Deals 1d10 physical damage.

tier_cr_1_5.name: Hellhound
tier_cr_1_5.description: A monstrous dog wreathed in flames that hunts for souls.

abilities.name: Fire Breath
abilities.effect: Deals 1d10 fire damage in a short cone.

tier_cr_1_5.name: Grave Worm
tier_cr_1_5.description: A massive undead worm that burrows through graveyards, consuming corpses and growing ever larger.

abilities.name: Acid Spit
abilities.effect: Deals 1d10 acid damage.
